health_check_rate.description: Magic WAN health check rate for tunnels created on this link. The default value is `mid`.

priority.description: Priority of WAN for traffic loadbalancing.

static_addressing.description: (optional) if omitted, use DHCP. Submit secondary_address when site is in high availability mode.

address.description: A valid CIDR notation representing an IP range.

secondary_address.description: A valid CIDR notation representing an IP range.

vlan_tag.description: VLAN ID. Use zero for untagged.
